mapper.select: select id, over_time_base, full_attendance_allowance, meal_allowance, traffic_allowance_own_a, traffic_allowance_own_b, traffic_allowance_own_c, traffic_allowance_bus_a, traffic_allowance_bus_b, traffic_allowance_bus_c, safety_allowance_a, safety_allowance_b, safety_allowance_c, one_child_allowance, high_temperature_start_date, high_temperature_end_date, high_temperature_allowance_a, high_temperature_allowance_b, high_temperature_allowance_c, duty_week_fee, duty_before_week_fee, duty_before_festival_fee, duty_weekend_fee, duty_festival_fee, duty_out_spring_fee, duty_in_spring_fee, union_fees, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date from hr_salary_setting

select id, over_time_base, full_attendance_allowance, meal_allowance, traffic_allowance_own_a, traffic_allowance_own_b, traffic_allowance_own_c, traffic_allowance_bus_a, traffic_allowance_bus_b, traffic_allowance_bus_c, safety_allowance_a, safety_allowance_b, safety_allowance_c, one_child_allowance, high_temperature_start_date, high_temperature_end_date, high_temperature_allowance_a, high_temperature_allowance_b, high_temperature_allowance_c, duty_week_fee, duty_before_week_fee, duty_before_festival_fee, duty_weekend_fee, duty_festival_fee, duty_out_spring_fee, duty_in_spring_fee, union_fees, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date from hr_salary_setting where id = #{salarySettingId}

select id, over_time_base, full_attendance_allowance, meal_allowance, traffic_allowance_own_a, traffic_allowance_own_b, traffic_allowance_own_c, traffic_allowance_bus_a, traffic_allowance_bus_b, traffic_allowance_bus_c, safety_allowance_a, safety_allowance_b, safety_allowance_c, one_child_allowance, high_temperature_start_date, high_temperature_end_date, high_temperature_allowance_a, high_temperature_allowance_b, high_temperature_allowance_c, duty_week_fee, duty_before_week_fee, duty_before_festival_fee, duty_weekend_fee, duty_festival_fee, duty_out_spring_fee, duty_in_spring_fee, union_fees, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date from hr_salary_setting order by last_modified_date desc limit 1
